item.title: Cryptocurrency Arbitrage (3): One More Strategy
item.description: It’s been months since my last update on cryptocurrency arbitrage strategies. The original version has been completely driven off the market and thus I decided to develop a new one. The market is primitive and savage in many senses, by which I mean there’re supposed to be a bunch of inefficiency and corresponding arbitrage opportunities. On the top of the page is the backtest PnL of the new strategy 4 from Jan 1 up to yesterday, July 26.
